Real World
==============
The experiments in real world were done inside the University of Genoa, in front
of the building G, and E, address via dellâ€™Opera Pia 13. There were two ramps
with different slopes planner's performance.


.. image:: diagrams/low_slope.png
  :width: 500
  :align: center
  :alt: low_slope


|

.. image:: diagrams/high_slope.jpg
  :width: 500
  :align: center
  :alt: high_slope


|

Here is a preview from the experiments done with Boston Dynamics Spot robot in a real world scenario, 
applying different configurations on the planner.
